sentences.en: A lorry travelling south had a blow-out and crashed.
sentences.cn: 一辆南行的卡车爆胎并撞车了。

sentences.en: a south-facing garden
sentences.cn: 朝南的花园

sentences.en: a village on the south coast
sentences.cn: 南部海岸的一座村庄

sentences.en: Further to the south are some of the island'sloveliest unspoilt coves.
sentences.cn: 再往南走有一些这个岛上尚未被破坏的迷人小海湾。

sentences.en: He was yesterday given bail by South Yorkshire magistrates.
sentences.cn: 昨天南约克郡法院准予他获得保释。

sentences.en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
sentences.cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

sentences.en: I am currently teaching in south Texas.
sentences.cn: 我目前在得克萨斯南部教书。

sentences.en: I think your South American youth has prejudiced you.
sentences.cn: 我认为你在南美度过的青少年时代让你产生了偏见。

sentences.en: Most of the birds had already flown south.
sentences.cn: 大部分的鸟都已南飞。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: The rebel forces simply bypassed Zwedru on their way further south.
sentences.cn: 叛军在向南部挺进时直接绕过了绥德鲁。

sentences.en: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened.
sentences.cn: 除非受恶劣天气干扰，南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

sentences.en: The temperature in the south will soar into the hundreds.
sentences.cn: 南方的温度会上升到一百多度。

sentences.en: This south-west region of France is the home of claret.
sentences.cn: 法国西南部的这个地区是干红葡萄酒的产地。

sentences.en: To the south the hills dropped away to farmland.
sentences.cn: 山势在南边一路下倾延伸至农田。

sentences.en: We took a plane south-west across the Anatolian plateau to Cappadocia.
sentences.cn: 我们乘飞机向着西南方向越过安纳托利亚高原，前往卡帕多西亚。

sentences.en: Which way is south?
sentences.cn: 哪面是南？

sentences.en: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.cn: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

sentences.en: You can go anywhere and still the compass points north or south.
sentences.cn: 无论走到哪里，罗盘仍然指向北或南。

trans.tran_en: in the south, or facing the south

trans.tran_en: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
